```{r }
library(TSA)
library(forecast)
library(zoo)
library(readxl)
library(lubridate)
library(magrittr)
library(ggplot2)
library(ggfortify)
```

```{r}
atlanta_data <- read_excel("atlanta-airport.xlsx")

atlanta_ts = ts(
  atlanta_data$TOTAL, 
  start = c(2002, 10), 
  frequency = 12
)
```


```{r}
# Decomposition of the plots
atlanta_ts %>% 
  decompose() %>% 
  autoplot()
```
```{r}
atlanta_ts %>% 
  ts(frequency = 1) %>% 
  acf(plot = FALSE) %>% 

  .  ggtitle("ACF")
```
